explanation: [0-0] On a rainy day, on a lush golf course, there's a path with accumulated water. In the distance, a naked man is holding an object in his hand, with trees behind him.

[0-10] The rain is pouring heavily. The man starts running forward, throws the object in his hand down, and jumps onto it. The object turns out to be a surfboard. He steps on the surfboard and starts gliding down the waterlogged path in a standard surfing posture. The camera follows his movement. As he gets closer, he bends down, gathers his strength, jumps up, and makes a 180-degree rotation in the air with the surfboard, then lands steadily and glides to the left.

[10-17] The camera continues to follow him. He controls the surfboard, turns it horizontally, then squats down, grabs the edges of the surfboard with both hands, and makes a braking motion. He stops the surfboard, pushing some dirty rainwater in front of him. The camera moves as he walks forward with the surfboard. Finally, the camera moves to the left, where there are some trees and dead branches.
